prompts: Create a musical Pokemon that can switch forms between different genres.
Imagine a graceful Pokemon with flowing hair and a charming demeanor.
Design a Fairy-type Pokemon that captivates others with its singing abilities.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique ability to influence emotions through music.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon that embodies both beauty and strength.
Make a Psychic-type Pokemon that loves to perform and entertain.
Give me a mysterious Pokemon that thrives in serene environments.
